title: Kerri-Anne Kennerley confronts Studio 10 co-host Joe Hildebrand after he called her a 'drunk'
text:
Kerri-Anne Kennerley confronted her Studio 10 co-host Joe Hildebrand on the show on Tuesday, after he called her a 'drunk' and said Sarah Harris 'constantly gives him death stares.'

The 66-year-old cheekily had a go at Joe, 43, after he made the comments while talking to KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie O recently.

'I'd like an explanation please for spreading some malicious lies!' Kerri-Anne said.

'I'd like an explanation please for spreading some malicious lies!' Kerri-Anne Kennerley (pictured) confronted Studio 10 co-host Joe Hildebrand on Tuesday after he called her a 'drunk' and said Sarah Harris 'constantly gives him death stares'

She cheekily added with a laugh and while holding her glass of water: 'I'd like you to taste that vodka, water, vodka.'

Sarah added that Joe made the comments because he has a 'mancrush' on Kyle and wanted to say something outrageous to get the shock jock onside.

On The Kyle and Jackie O Show, Joe said that he never knows if Kerri-Anne is 'still drunk from the night before' and said that Sarah constantly gives him 'death stares.'

Putting his foot in it! On The Kyle and Jackie O Show, Joe (pictured) said that he never knows if Kerri-Anne is 'still drunk from the night before' and said that Sarah constantly gives him 'death stares'

'They're good, everything is popping along nicely,' Joe began, before jokingly changing his tune.

'That's a lie, they're all crazy, you go in, KAK (sic), you don't know if she's still drunk from the night before. Sarah Harris just constantly death staring me if she's too far away to kick me.'

He then added that Sarah constantly shows him videos or is sub-tweeting.

Awkward: He then added that Sarah (pictured) constantly shows him videos or is sub-tweeting

It comes after Kerri-Anne admitted this week that she's still 'angry' over husband John's death.

In an interview with The Australian Women's Weekly, Kerri-Anne reflected on her life since John's passing - and also revealed for the first time the heartbreaking question John asked her while he was fighting for his life in hospital.

John died in February, aged 75, almost three years after a freak accident at a Coffs Harbour golf course in March 2016 left him a quadriplegic.

Candid: It comes after Kerri-Anne admitted this week that she's still 'angry' over husband John's death

'I feel cheated, not just for myself and my loss but also for John and the life that he should have continued to live,' said Kerri-Anne.

The 66-year-old Logie winner added that John's father lived to be 100 years old, so she always assumed her husband would have a long life.

'So anger, as a word, doesn't even begin to cover what I feel,' she said.
description: Kerri-Anne Kennerley confronted her Studio 10 co-host Joe Hildebrand on the show on Tuesday, after he called her a 'drunk' and said Sarah Harris 'constantly gives him death stares.'
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
